text: BeatBullying (BB) is a national charity in the United Kingdom. The purpose of BB is to help people to understand, recognise, and say no to bullying. This is done by giving them the tools to change their lives and the lives of other people.BeatBullying, "About BB" ; retrieved 2013-2-19. ==History== BeatBullying was established in 2002. ==References== ==Other websites == * BeatBullying website * BeatBullying (1097631) at CharityCommission.gov.uk Category:2002 establishments in the United Kingdom Category:Bullying Category:Charities of the United Kingdom
title: BeatBullying
